text: The Copa del Generalísimo 1950 Final was the 48th final of the King's Cup. The final was played at Estadio Chamartín in Madrid, on 28 May 1950, being won by Atlético de Bilbao, who beat Real Valladolid 4-1 after extra time. ==Details== {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="4"|Atlético de Bilbao: |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK ||1 || Raimundo Lezama |- |DF ||2|| Canito |- |DF ||3|| Serafín Areta |- |DF ||4|| Anselmo Aramberri |- |MF ||5|| Manolín |- |MF ||6|| Nando |- |FW ||7|| Rafael Iriondo |- |FW ||8|| Venancio |- |FW ||9|| Telmo Zarra |- |FW||10|| José Luis Panizo (c) |- |FW||11|| Agustín Gaínza |- |colspan=4|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| José Iraragorri |} |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align=center |colspan="4"|Real Valladolid: |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK ||1|| José Luis Saso |- |DF ||2|| Francisco Lesmes |- |DF ||3|| Joan Babot |- |DF ||4|| Rafael Lesmes |- |MF ||5|| Juan Antonio Ortega |- |MF ||6|| Isidro Lasala |- |FW ||7|| Apolinar Revuelta |- |FW ||8|| Gerardo Coque |- |FW ||9|| Julián Vaquero (c) |- |FW||10|| Emilio Aldecoa |- |FW||11|| Francisco Juanco |- |colspan=4|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| Antonio Barrios |- |} |} ==References== 1950 Copa Category:Real Valladolid matches Category:Athletic Bilbao matches
title: 1950 Copa del Generalísimo Final
